name: Jump Ship (anana006, Echonox)
description:
You're a spaceman on a spaceship that just got invaded by hungry aliens! Make your way to the exit without getting attacked and save as much of your crew as possible!

Credits: Annie Xu (Programming, Art, Design), Ryan Hartanto (Programming, Music, Design)

WASD to move. Limited action count per turn. Sacrifice costs one human. Fight costs nothing, but could result in death.
